title: Working Inside the Parentheses
text: The first step is to work on the expression inside the parentheses.
speech: The first step is to work on the expression inside the parentheses.
pacedSpeech: The first step is to work on the expression inside the parentheses.

title: Multiplying the Expression in the Parentheses
text: The next step is to multiply the expression in the parentheses by the factor outside of it, which is $$3$$. What is $$3(6-2)$$?
speech: The next step is to multiply the expression in the parentheses by the factor outside of it, which is  3 . What is  3, times, parentheses 6 minus 2,  ?
pacedSpeech: The next step is to multiply the expression in the parentheses by the factor outside of it, which is   3

title: Subtracting Inside the Absolute Value Bars
text: Then, subtract within the absolute value bar. What is $$19-3(6-2)$$? Remember that you've calculated the second term in the previous step.
speech: Then, subtract within the absolute value bar. What is  19 minus, 3 times, parentheses 6 minus 2,  ? Remember that you've calculated the second term in the previous step.
pacedSpeech: Then, subtract within the absolute value bar. What is   19 minus, 3 times,  6 minus 2,
? Remember that you've calculated the second term in the previous step.

title: Getting Rid of the Absolute Value Bars
text: The value $$19-3(6-2)$$, calculated in the previous step, is positive. so we can get rid of the absolute value bars. Then, the expression is $$24-7$$.
speech: The value  19 minus 3 parentheses 6 minus 2,  , calculated in the previous step, is positive. so we can get rid of the absolute value bars. Then, the expression is  24 minus 7 .

title: Final Step
text: What is $$24-7$$? The answer to this is the final answer.
speech: What is  24 minus 7 ? The answer to this is the final answer.
